Instance.description: Change outfit super interaction that will use generate change outfit affordances to all depending on the outfits available for change.

TunableList.name: body_type_chance_overrides
TunableList.description: Define body type chance overrides for the generate outfit. For example, if BODYTYPE_HAT is mapped to 100%, then the outfit is guaranteed to have a hat if any hat matches the specified tags. If used in an appearance modifier, these body types will contribute to the flags that determine which body types can be generated, regardless of their percent chance.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The chance that a part is applied to the corresponding body type.

TunableList.name: body_type_match_not_found_policy
TunableList.display: Body Type Match Not Found Policy
TunableList.description: The policy we should take for a body type that we fail to find a match for. Primary example is to use MATCH_NOT_FOUND_KEEP_EXISTING for generating a tshirt and making sure a sim wearing full body has a lower body cas part. If used in an appearance modifier, these body types will contribute to the flags that determine which body types can be generated.

TunableList.name: filter_flag
TunableList.description: Define how to handle part randomization for the generated outfit.

TunableEnum.name: outfit_change_category
TunableEnum.description: The outfit category the change will be tied to.

TunableVariant.name: outfit_change_type
TunableVariant.description: Possible ingredient mapping by object definition of by catalog object Tag.

TunableTuple.name: from_outfit_tags
TunableTuple.description: Handles generation of outfit change interactions based on the tuned outfit tags.

TunableList.name: outfit_change_data
TunableList.description: List of data corresponding at possible outfits and tests that will generate change outfit affordances.

TunableTuple.description: Outfits and tests that will generate the change outfit interactions.

TunableEnum.name: outfit_tag
TunableEnum.description: Outfit tag that will generate the outfit change interactions.

TdescFragTag.name: outfit_tests
TdescFragTag.description: Tests the Sim should pass to be able to change into the outfit.

TunableTuple.name: from_situation
TunableTuple.description: Handles generation of outfit change interactions based on the tuned situations.

TunableEnum.description: Tags for situations that will be considered for the outfit interactions.

TunableVariant.name: xevt_id
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the outfit change will run at the specified xevt, otherwise the outfit change will run at the end of the interaction's basic content.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Xevt id to trigger outfit change on.
